resources.string: Seekdisk is a free application on smartphone that allows its user to find the dishes offered by the reffernced restaurants. Corresponding most to their tastes.

The user will indicate to the application dishes or ingredients that he likes or does not like. Seekdish\'s taste analytics engine will use this data to offer compatible dishes in restaurant around of the user.
But you can also ask Seekdish and recommend dishes you have never tasted. Here again the community of lovers of these dishes in Seekdish will take you to the restaurant with the best ratings.
The more user search for and rate dishes,the more Seekdish can recommend dishes that have appeared to other users with similar tastes.
No meals found at your location. Change your location in Settings.
No restaurant found at your location. Change your location in Settings.
You have not added anything to Todo List for now.
You have not added anything to Favorite List for now.
